dcterms:creator: Ming Zhou
H. Liu
Z. Huang
X. Mo
C. Lv
dcterms:description: SMARTS is a scalable multi-agent reinforcement learning training school designed for autonomous driving, providing various urban benchmarking scenarios for evaluation.
dcterms:title: SMARTS

dcterms:creator: H. Liu
Z. Huang
X. Mo
C. Lv
dcterms:description: The Scene-Rep Transformer (SRT) is a transformer-based framework that augments reinforcement learning with scene representation learning for decision-making in autonomous driving.
dcterms:title: Scene-Rep Transformer (SRT)

dcterms:description: Various driving scenarios such as Left Turn-T, Roundabout, and Double Merge are utilized within the SMARTS simulator to evaluate the DAD-RL framework.
dcterms:title: Various driving scenarios

dcterms:description: Imitation Learning (IL) methods are referenced as general approaches for developing decision-making abilities that mimic expert drivers in autonomous driving.
dcterms:title: Imitation Learning (IL) methods
